results.title: Metformin reduces pleural fibroelastosis by inhibition of extracellular matrix production induced by CD90-positive myofibroblasts.
results.text_hl: We assessed the expression of the myofibroblast surface marker @GENE_THY1 @GENE_21838 @@@CD90@@@ in the @<m>DISEASE_Solitary_Fibrous_Tumor_Pleural</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054363 @@@fibrotic pleura@@@ and the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in vivo and in vitro.

citations.NLM: Aoshima Y, Enomoto Y, Fukada A, Kurita Y, Matsushima S, Meguro S, Kosugi I, Kawasaki H, Katsura H, Fujisawa T, Enomoto N, Nakamura Y, Inui N, Suda T, Iwashita T. Metformin reduces pleural fibroelastosis by inhibition of extracellular matrix production induced by CD90-positive myofibroblasts. Am J Transl Res. 2021;13(11):12318-12337. PMID: 34956455
